member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.SetIconByIcoFile(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the system tray given an .ico file.
member.param: The filespec of the .ico file. Environment variables are allowed.

member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.SetIconByDllFile(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the system tray from a .dll or .exe file.
member.param: The path and name of a .dll or .exe file that contains icons.
The index of the icon. An integer.
A boolean: true extracts a loarge icon, false extracts a large icon.

member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.SetBalloonTipIcon(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the icon of the "balloon tip" or notification.
member.param: An integer. Return values of one of the four methods (Error, Info, None, Warning) of can be used.

member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.Dispose
member.summary:
Disposes of the icon resources when it is no longer needed.
If this method is not called, the icon may persist in the system tray until the mouse hovers over it, even after the object instance has lost scope.

member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip
member.summary: Show the baloon tip.

member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.AddMenuItem(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Add a menu item to the system tray icon's context menu.
This method can be called only from VBScript.
member.param: string: The text that appears in the menu.
object: The VBScript object reference returned by GetRef in VBScript.

member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.InvokeCallbackByIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Provide callback testability from VBScript.

member.name: M:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.ShowContextMenu
member.summary: Show the context menu.
member.remarks: Public in order to provide testability from VBScript.

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the type is under development.
Affects the behavior of two methods, if exceptions are thrown. See and

member.name: P:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text shown when the mouse hovers over the system tray icon.

member.name: P:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon's visibility. A boolean.

member.name: P:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the "balloon tip" or notification.

member.name: P:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the "balloon tip" or notification.

member.name: P:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.BalloonTipLifetime
member.summary: Gets or sets the lifetime of the "balloon tip" or notification. An integer (milliseconds). Deprecated as of Windows Vista. Now the value is overridden by accessibility settings.

member.name: P:VBScripting.NotifyIcon.ToolTipIcon
member.summary: Provides an object useful in VBScript for selecting a ToolTipIcon type. The methods (Error, Info, None, Warning) may be used with .

member.name: T:VBScripting.ToolTipIcon
member.summary:
C# enum not intended for use by VBScript.
Corresponds to but not equivalent to System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon.

member.name: F:VBScripting.ToolTipIcon.Error
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 1

member.name: F:VBScripting.ToolTipIcon.Info
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 2

member.name: F:VBScripting.ToolTipIcon.None
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 3

member.name: F:VBScripting.ToolTipIcon.Warning
member.summary: Return value can be cast to an int: 4

member.name: T:VBScripting.ToolTipIconT
member.summary:
Supplies the type required by
Not intended for use in VBScript.
